text: The Northern Hiking Loop at Chestnut Nature Park was relatively more rugged compared to many other trails in Singapore. We decided to go to the Northern Loop because the Southern Loop was partially closed.
Good trail for hikers. Very easy hike. Be careful and keep a look out for group of wild boars, though they are more afraid of us.
Another great place for a relaxing walk with nice scenery. My 2nd choice for a quick walk
Comfortable walk. Not crowded.  Saw a few colugo and one of it with its baby.
